data.text:
Private Label

Welcome to OAKMORE's private label world!

Alongside our production of OAKMORE styles, we have specialized in developing and producing private labels for national and international fashion companies.

Our strength lies in creative innovation, stringent quality standards, thorough quality control, and, most importantly, maintaining a strong presence with both our customers and suppliers. OAKMORE exclusively manufactures at reputable and approved facilities.

Unique private label design.

Our strength lies in creative innovation, stringent quality standards, thorough quality control, and, most importantly, maintaining a strong presence!

Unique and individual solutions to specific needs

Shirts

We can produce private label shirts starting from 100 pieces. Minimum of 10 pieces per size. The shirts can be manufactured in Europe or Asia.

We can make shirts in all qualities, ranging from an affordable CVC to a 100% cotton NON IRON. Based on your wishes and needs, we have drawings made of the shirts.

When we reach agreement on the details, we create a final sample for final approval. After approval of the shirt, production begins.

Branding options:

Embroidery on the chest, collar, or elsewhere on the shirt

Printed logo

Allover print

Logo on the buttons

Badge with logo

Fabric in pantone colour

Neck label with your logo

Contrast fabric in the collar with your logo

Knit

We can produce private label knitwear starting from 100 pieces. Minimum of 10 pieces per size. Knitwear can be manufactured in Europe or Asia.

Based on your wishes and needs, we have drawings made of the knitwear.

When we reach agreement on the details, we create a final sample for final approval. After approval of the knitwear, production begins.

Branding options:

Embroidery on the chest, or elsewhere on the sweater.

Badge with logo

Neck label with your logo

Scarves

We can produce men's and women's scarves starting from 100 pieces per design. The scarves can be manufactured in Italy or China in various qualities: recycled polyester, Tencel, bamboo, silk, wool, linen, cotton, etc.

Based on your wishes and needs, we have drawings made of the scarves.

When we reach agreement on the details, we create a final sample for final approval. After approval of the scarf, production begins.

Branding options:

Fashion patterns made in your pantone colours

Fashion patterns with your logo incorporated in the pattern

All-over pattern with your logo. Printed or woven

Woven label with your logo

Sewn-on badge with your logo

Ties

We can produce ties and bow ties starting from 50 pieces per design. They can be manufactured in Italy or China in various qualities: Recycled polyester, Tencel, bamboo, silk, wool, linen, cotton, etc.

Based on your wishes and needs, we have drawings made of the products.

When we reach agreement on the details, we create a final sample for final approval. After approval, production begins.

Branding options:

Fashion patterns made in your pantone colours

Fashion patterns with your logo incorporated in the pattern

All-over pattern with your logo. Printed or woven

Woven label with your logo

Jacquard woven logo

Caps

We can produce caps starting from 50 pieces per design.

Based on your wishes and needs, we have drawings made of the products.

When we reach agreement on the details, we create a final sample for final approval. After approval, production begins.

Branding options:

Embroidered logo

Woven label with your logo

Label with your logo

Your logo on the metal clasp
